Arcane Armor: Self armor negates any Str requirement, covers whole body, replaces missing limbs, and can be put on or taken off in 1 action
Arcane Jolt: Magic weapon or Steel Defender attack inflicts +4d6 HP force or heals 1 target in 30' radius 4d6 HP 3/long rest
Battle Ready: +2 (Int instead of Str) or +1 (Int instead of Dex) attack and damage w/magic weapons
Defensive Field: Armor gives 20 temporary HP 6/long rest
Eldritch Cannon: Create magical, AC 18, 100 HP (Mending repairs 2d6 HP), MV 15' flamethrower (15' cone inflicts 3d8 HP fire (DC 17 Dex half)), force ballista (R120' inflicts 3d8 force and pushes 5'), or protector (R10' targets gain 1d8+3 temporary HP) for 1 hr
Fortified Position: Create 2nd Eldritch Cannon, gain half cover w/in 10' of Eldritch Cannon
Lightning Launcher: Range 90/300 attack inflicts 1d6 HP lightning, +1d6 HP lightning 1/rd
Perfected Armor (Guardian Armor): R30' Use Reaction to pull creature up to 30' (DC 17 Str neg) and attack if w/in 5' afterward 6/long rest
Perfected Armor (Infiltrator Armor): Lightning Launcher inflicts glow giving Disadv on attacks on self, next foe attack gains Adv and inflicts +1d6 HP lightning for 1 rd
Soul Of Artifice: End 1 attunement when reduced to 0 HP to retain 1 HP
Steel Defender: Create mechanical companion (AC 17, HP 105 (Mending repairs 2d6 HP, self-repair 2d8+6 3/dy), Attack +9 inflicts 1d8+6, use Reaction for R5' Deflect Attack (inflicts Disadv on attack), MV 40', Dex Save +7, Con save +8, immune to poison and charmed, exhausted, poisoned, and surprised conditions)
Thunder Gauntlets: Each gauntlet inflicts 1d8 HP thunder and Disadv on attacks on others for 1 rd

Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Know 2 D0 spells, cast 1 D1/long rest
Alchemical Savant: +3 on spell healing and acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage
Arcane Firearm: Spells cast through prepared wand, staff, or rod inflict +1d8 HP damage
Arcane Propulsion Armor: Gives +5' Speed, magical gauntlets inflict 1d8 HP force range 20/60 and returns, replaces missing limbs
Armor Of Magical Strength: Gives +3 Str check or saving throw or use Reaction to avoid being knocked prone; 6 charges regains 1d6/dy
Boots Of The Winding Path: Gives ability to teleport 15'
Chemical Mastery: Cast Greater Restoration and Heal 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Enhanced Arcane Focus: Rod, staff, or wand gives +2 spell attacks, ignores half cover
Enhanced Defense: Shield or armor gives +2 AC
Enhanced Weapon: Gives +2 attack and damage
Experimental Elixir: After a long rest, use alchemist's supplies to create 3 elixirs of healing, swiftness, resilience, boldness, flight, or transformation (spend spell slot for additional)
Helm Of Awareness: Gives Adv on initiative and cannot be surprised
Homunculus Servant: Creates mechanical companion (AC 13, HP 24, Attack R30' +9 inflicts 1d4+6 HP force, Evasion, Channel Magic) that obeys self
Magical Tinkering: Imbue 3 objects with light, message, sound, odor, or picture
Mind Sharpener: Gives Reaction to change failed Con save for spell concentration to success; 4 charges regains 1d4/dy
Radiant Weapon: Gives +1 attack and damage, 30' bright light, blinds successful attacker (DC 17 Con neg) for 1 rd; 4 charges regains 1d4/dy
Repeating Shot: Gives +1 attack and damage and unlimited ammunition
Replicate Magic Item: Allows replication of wondrous item
Repulsion Shield: Gives +1 AC, use Reaction to push successful attacker 15'; 4 charges regains 1d4/dy
Resistant Armor: Gives +1 AC and resistance to chosen damage type
Restorative Reagents: Cast Lesser Restoration 3/long rest, elixirs give 2d6+3 temporary HP
Returning Weapon: Gives +1 attack and damage, returns after ranged attack
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
